data.title: The 'disconnect' event could not be triggered while closing SocketIO
data.body: Just reported by a developer, we need to make a test case to reproduce it.

data.title: Using contentSize instead of winSize for Menu
data.body:
As in title, Menu always set everything with respect to windows size.
For example,
In Menu::alignItemsInColumnsWithArray we have
`Size winSize = Director::getInstance()->getWinSize();`
The position of each MenuItem will be set relative to the winSize. This makes it very difficult to align items in a given area, it always expands to the whole screen.
I suggest changing it to the following
`Size winSize = getContentSize();`
So that we can do something like `menu->setContentSize(Size(vsize,hsize));` to easily limit the span of the menu.
As by default we will fall back and use the windows size.

data.title: [android] Cocos2dxActivity is re-created which will cause crash
data.body:
It's a bug of android: Please refer to 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/16283079/re-launch-of-activity-on-home-button-but-only-the-first-time/16447508#

- cocos2d-x version: v3.13.1
- devices test on: All android devices
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r10e
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Click 'Run' button in the Installer to run a cocos game.
2. Press 'Home' button to make game enter background
3. Click game icon in desktop to go back to game
4. Crash appear.
